action.name: Extract Here
action.command: cd %d && case "%f" in *.zip) unzip -o "%f";; *.tar.gz|*.tgz) tar -xzf "%f";; *.tar.bz2|*.tbz2) tar -xjf "%f";; *.tar.xz|*.txz) tar -xJf "%f";; *.tar) tar -xf "%f";; *.7z|*.rar) 7z x "%f";; *) notify-send "Extract" "Unsupported archive format";; esac
action.description: Extract archive contents to current directory

action.name: Extract to Folder
action.command: cd %d && name="%n" && name="${name%%.*}" && mkdir -p "$name" && case "%f" in *.zip) unzip -o "%f" -d "$name";; *.tar.gz|*.tgz) tar -xzf "%f" -C "$name";; *.tar.bz2|*.tbz2) tar -xjf "%f" -C "$name";; *.tar.xz|*.txz) tar -xJf "%f" -C "$name";; *.tar) tar -xf "%f" -C "$name";; *.7z|*.rar) 7z x "%f" -o"$name";; esac
action.description: Extract archive to a new folder named after the archive

action.name: Compress to ZIP
action.description: Create ZIP archive from selected files
